test.name: 1.ensure user able to see the app logo in login page
2.ensure user able to see the please enter your number text in login page
3.ensure user able to see the validation if click on login button without enter the phone number
4.ensure user able to see the validation message if click on login button with enter invalid phone number
5.ensure user able to login with enter valid phone number or login button working fine with valid phone number
6.ensure phone number and pin autoclear is working fine when click on pinentrypage cancell button
7.ensure user able see temperary pin text in pin entry page
8.ensure user able see enterpin text in pin entry page
9.ensure user able see the validation message if we try to login without entry the pin
10.ensure user able see the validation message if we try to login with invalid or expired pin
11.ensure user able see app logo in pin entry page
12.ensure user able login with entry the valid pin
13.ensure user able select any merchant in merchant list page
14.ensure user able see the same number in joinform phone number box which one entered in login page
15.ensure user able sigup through joinform by entring all required fields
16.ensure user able sigup through rejoinform with already registered number
